itunes:title: Episode 1081 - Rob O’Neill On The State Of America
title: Episode 1081 - Rob O’Neill On The State Of America
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Rob O’Neill, the Navy SEAL who killed Osama bin Laden, joins the show to talk about his new podcast “The Operator”, the FBI raid on Donald Trump’s home in Mar-a-Lago, the Biden administration adding 87,000 agents to the IRS, and what the general state of...
itunes:summary:
Rob O’Neill, the Navy SEAL who killed Osama bin Laden, joins the show to talk about his new podcast “The Operator”, the FBI raid on Donald Trump’s home in Mar-a-Lago, the Biden administration adding 87,000 agents to the IRS, and what the general state of the nation is right now.

 

Listen to "The Operator" on Apple Podcasts and Spotify
